name: Githzerai
description: Githzerai are ascetics and philosophers from the plane of Limbo. They are known for their psionic abilities and their monastic discipline.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Githzerai Psionics
traits.description: You know the Mage Hand cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Shield once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast Detect Thoughts once per long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Mental Discipline
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against the charmed and frightened conditions.
